line.comment: * If I am an ally, and if during the fight my relation with my friend got worse, I get out of here.
* Dirty wars by Player or Xenon or OCV: we need to disengage from the battle if not needed anymore (see Mayhem.Signal.SOS).

sval.val: If I am an ally, and if during the fight my relation with my friend got worse, I get out of here.
Dirty wars by Player or Xenon or OCV: we need to disengage from the battle if not needed anymore (see Mayhem.Signal.SOS).
